mapper.select: SELECT b.id, b.user_id, b.hit, b.title, b.date, b.contents, b.category, b.sympathy, u.name, u.photo FROM boards AS b JOIN users AS u ON b.user_id = u.id WHERE category = 'suggestion' ORDER BY date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO boards (user_id, title, date, contents, category, attachment) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{title}, NOW(), #{contents}, #{category}, #{attachment})
mapper.select: SELECT b.id, b.user_id, b.hit, b.title, b.date, b.contents, b.category, b.sympathy, b.attachment, u.name, u.photo FROM boards AS b JOIN users AS u ON b.user_id = u.id WHERE b.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE boards SET hit = hit + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comments(user_id, board_id, date, content, nickname) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{board_id}, now(), #{content}, #{nickname})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM comments JOIN users on comments.user_id = users.id WHERE board_id = #{board_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE comments SET nickname=#{nickname}, content=#{content}, mod_date=now() where id = #{id}
